meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the larynx.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use laryngoscopes to look at the voice box.
meanings.sent2: The hospital purchased new laryngoscopes for the ENT department.
meanings.sent3: During the check-up, the laryngoscopes made the patient giggle.
meanings.sent4: The laryngoscopes were like tiny telescopes exploring the throat.
meanings.sent5: The shiny laryngoscopes gleamed under the bright lights of the clinic.

meanings.sent1: In the medical supply room, there are multiple laryngoscopes.
meanings.sent2: The doctors always ensure they have enough laryngoscopes for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The laryngoscopes on the shelf looked like a row of tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The collection of laryngoscopes gleamed like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The hospital staff counted the laryngoscopes to make sure none were missing.
